EmailTemplate.name: 17.IPVideo.IP-Video.Anyvision.N.G.N.18383.Anyvision Nurture.Email 2
EmailTemplate.subject: White paper: Are you ready for Any Vision?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> How to prepare for Any Vision – the future of TV and video White paper This white paper describes and discusses the implications of Nokia’s Any Vision – our prediction for the evolving television and video industry. Over the next decade, we see a dramatic transformation that will create unprecedented opportunities and challenges for television operators.
Download the Any Vision white paper <[[https://pages.nokia.com/14872.Any.Vision.LP.html]]> now to get details. See how you can prepare for and benefit from the Any Vision world. More on Any Vision: Visit our website <[[https://networks.nokia.com/solutions/ip-video/anyvision]]> Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
